an7.56:4.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati gijjhakūṭe pabbate.
an7.56:4.3: Atha kho dve devatā abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā kevalakappaṃ gijjhakūṭaṃ obhāsetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
an7.56:4.5: Ekamantaṃ ṭhitā kho ekā devatā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an7.56:4.11: Atha kho tā devatā “samanuñño satthā”ti bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā tatthevantaradhāyiṃsu.
an7.56:5.1: Atha kho bhagavā tassā rattiyā accayena bhikkhū āmantesi:
an7.56:5.2: “imaṃ, bhikkhave, rattiṃ dve devatā abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā kevalakappaṃ gijjhakūṭaṃ obhāsetvā yenāhaṃ tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
an7.56:5.4: Ekamantaṃ ṭhitā kho, bhikkhave, ekā devatā maṃ etadavoca:
an7.56:5.9: Idaṃ vatvā maṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā tatthevantaradhāyiṃsū”ti.
an7.56:6.1: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā mahāmoggallāno bhagavato avidūre nisinno hoti.
an7.56:6.5: Tena kho pana samayena tisso nāma bhikkhu adhunākālaṅkato aññataraṃ brahmalokaṃ upapanno hoti.
an7.56:7.2: seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṃ vā bāhaṃ pasāreyya, pasāritaṃ vā bāhaṃ samiñjeyya;
an7.56:7.4: gijjhakūṭe pabbate antarahito tasmiṃ brahmaloke pāturahosi.
an7.56:7.5: Addasā kho tisso brahmā āyasmantaṃ mahāmoggallānaṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ.
an7.56:7.9: Cirassaṃ kho, mārisa moggallāna, imaṃ pariyāyamakāsi, yadidaṃ idhāgamanāya.
an7.56:7.11: Nisīdi kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno paññatte āsane.
an7.56:7.12: Tissopi kho brahmā āyasmantaṃ mahāmoggallānaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
an7.56:7.13: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho tissaṃ brahmānaṃ āyasmā mahāmoggallāno etadavoca:
an7.56:7.14: “katamesānaṃ kho, tissa, devānaṃ evaṃ ñāṇaṃ hoti:
an7.56:7.16: “Brahmakāyikānaṃ kho, mārisa moggallāna, devānaṃ evaṃ ñāṇaṃ hoti:
an7.56:8.1: “Sabbesaññeva kho, tissa, brahmakāyikānaṃ devānaṃ evaṃ ñāṇaṃ hoti:
an7.56:8.3: “Na kho, mārisa moggallāna, sabbesaṃ brahmakāyikānaṃ devānaṃ evaṃ ñāṇaṃ hoti:
an7.56:9.1: Ye kho te, mārisa moggallāna, brahmakāyikā devā brahmena āyunā santuṭṭhā brahmena vaṇṇena brahmena sukhena brahmena yasena brahmena ādhipateyyena santuṭṭhā, te uttari nissaraṇaṃ yathābhūtaṃ nappajānanti.
an7.56:9.4: Ye ca kho te, mārisa moggallāna, brahmakāyikā devā brahmena āyunā asantuṭṭhā, brahmena vaṇṇena brahmena sukhena brahmena yasena brahmena ādhipateyyena asantuṭṭhā, te ca uttari nissaraṇaṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānanti.
an7.56:10.1: Idha, mārisa moggallāna, bhikkhu ubhatobhāgavimutto hoti.
an7.56:10.4: Yāvassa kāyo ṭhassati tāva naṃ dakkhanti devamanussā.
an7.56:10.5: Kāyassa bhedā na naṃ dakkhanti devamanussā’ti.
an7.56:10.6: Evampi kho, mārisa moggallāna, tesaṃ devānaṃ ñāṇaṃ hoti:
an7.56:11.1: Idha pana, mārisa moggallāna, bhikkhu paññāvimutto hoti.
an7.56:11.4: Yāvassa kāyo ṭhassati tāva naṃ dakkhanti devamanussā.
an7.56:11.5: Kāyassa bhedā na naṃ dakkhanti devamanussā’ti.
an7.56:11.6: Evampi kho, mārisa moggallāna, tesaṃ devānaṃ ñāṇaṃ hoti:
an7.56:12.1: Idha pana, mārisa moggallāna, bhikkhu kāyasakkhī hoti.
an7.56:12.4: Appeva nāma ayamāyasmā anulomikāni senāsanāni paṭisevamāno kalyāṇamitte bhajamāno indriyāni samannānayamāno—
an7.56:12.5: yassatthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajanti, tadanuttaraṃ—
an7.56:12.6: brahmacariyapariyosānaṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihareyyā’ti.
an7.56:12.7: Evampi kho, mārisa moggallāna, tesaṃ devānaṃ ñāṇaṃ hoti:
an7.56:13.1: Idha pana, mārisa moggallāna, bhikkhu diṭṭhippatto hoti … pe …
an7.56:13.6: Appeva nāma ayamāyasmā anulomikāni senāsanāni paṭisevamāno kalyāṇamitte bhajamāno indriyāni samannānayamāno—
an7.56:13.7: yassatthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajanti, tadanuttaraṃ—
an7.56:13.8: brahmacariyapariyosānaṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihareyyā’ti.
an7.56:13.9: Evampi kho, mārisa moggallāna, tesaṃ devānaṃ ñāṇaṃ hoti:
an7.56:14.1: Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno tissassa brahmuno bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā—
an7.56:14.2: seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṃ vā bāhaṃ pasāreyya, pasāritaṃ vā bāhaṃ samiñjeyya;
an7.56:14.5: Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an7.56:14.7: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno yāvatako ahosi tissena brahmunā saddhiṃ kathāsallāpo taṃ sabbaṃ bhagavato ārocesi.
an7.56:15.1: “Na hi pana te, moggallāna, tisso brahmā sattamaṃ animittavihāriṃ puggalaṃ deseti”.
an7.56:15.3: Yaṃ bhagavā sattamaṃ animittavihāriṃ puggalaṃ deseyya.
an7.56:15.5: “Tena hi, moggallāna, suṇāhi, sādhukaṃ manasi karohi;
an7.56:15.7: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno bhagavato paccassosi.
an7.56:16.1: “Idha, moggallāna, bhikkhu sabbanimittānaṃ amanasikārā animittaṃ cetosamādhiṃ upasampajja viharati.
an7.56:16.3: ‘ayaṃ kho āyasmā sabbanimittānaṃ amanasikārā animittaṃ cetosamādhiṃ upasampajja viharati.
an7.56:16.4: Appeva nāma ayamāyasmā anulomikāni senāsanāni paṭisevamāno kalyāṇamitte bhajamāno indriyāni samannānayamāno—
an7.56:16.5: yassatthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajanti, tadanuttaraṃ—
an7.56:16.6: brahmacariyapariyosānaṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihareyyā’ti.
an7.56:16.7: Evaṃ kho, moggallāna, tesaṃ devānaṃ ñāṇaṃ hoti:
